attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to listen to the facts when it comes to shooting & conservation not anti fieldsports propaganda.
farming & rural communities are forgotten in the uk, it seams that time & time again we are ignored. The government are influenced by who ever makes the the biggest noise & not facts.
The evidence is clear when it comes to the countryside, we produce, we provide, we contribute.
Ring fence shooting & conservation as the Evidence is overwhelming that it benefits the diversity & protection of animal species,  woodlands & Environment maintaining a healthy ecosystem for all species.
attributes.background: Leave the Countryside Alone! we are under attacks by those who dont know anything about the countryside, from farming to fieldsports, protect Farmers and landowners from crime to protect gamekeepers, stalkers and their families from unjust non evidenced based attacks from the anti shooting community

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
